next_steps.note: "Research and document 3 advanced IP scanning techniques beyond basic ping sweeps (e.g., TCP Connect Scan, SYN Scan, UDP Scan). Detail their pros/cons and potential evasion methods.",
"Select a primary programming language and framework for implementing the scanner (e.g., Python with Scapy, Go with gopacket). Document the rationale for this choice.",
"Design the core architecture of the scanner, including modules for target definition, scan type selection, packet crafting, response analysis, and reporting. Create a basic class/module diagram.",
"Implement a basic 'ping sweep' functionality as a proof-of-concept. This will establish the foundation for sending packets and receiving responses. Include error handling.",
"Define a data storage strategy for scan results. Consider options like CSV, JSON, or a simple database (SQLite). Prototype basic result storage and retrieval."
